text: Ani masalivalya (yunusa alai.) Ci (athavana kara) jevha te naraja ho'una nighuna gele ani ase samajata hote ki amhi tyanna dharanara nahi. Sevati tyanni tya andharammadhuna pukarale, he upasaniya (allaha)! Tujhyakherija konihi upasya nahi. Tu pavitra ahesa. Niscitaca mi atyacari lokampaiki ahe
